## Problem Description

A clear description of the problem or limitation you're experiencing. Ex. "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like. Be as specific as possible about the expected behavior.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered and why they wouldn't work as well.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.
